activities.description: Visit Marienplatz (central square, iconic landmarks, and great for walking). Stop by Sweet Spot Coffee for a specialty coffee experience.
Explore the Viktualienmarkt (outdoor market with food stalls and local goods). Lunch at a nearby café or market stall.
Visit Asamkirche (ornate baroque church, free entry). Dinner at a cozy indoor restaurant.

daily_itinerary.weather_advice: Light rain expected. Wear a waterproof jacket, warm layers, and water-resistant shoes. Bring an umbrella.

activities.description: Take a walk in the English Garden (one of the largest urban parks in the world). Coffee break at Man Versus Machine Coffee Roasters.
Visit Nymphenburg Palace (beautiful gardens and architecture, partially outdoors). Lunch at a nearby café.
Explore BMW Welt (indoor exhibition of German engineering, free entry). Dinner at a local Bavarian restaurant.

daily_itinerary.weather_advice: Light rain expected. Dress warmly and bring waterproof gear. Consider shorter walks if rain intensifies.

activities.description: Stroll through Olympiapark (site of the 1972 Olympics, scenic views). Coffee at Kanso Coffee Lab.
Visit the Munich City Museum (indoor activity, great for rainy weather). Lunch at a nearby café.
Free time for shopping or revisiting favorite spots. Dinner at a cozy café or restaurant.

daily_itinerary.weather_advice: Light rain expected. Opt for indoor activities if rain persists. Bring an umbrella and wear waterproof shoes.

weather_advice: Rain expected all three days. Dress warmly with waterproof layers and bring an umbrella.
transportation_advice: Walking is feasible for most locations, but consider short taxi rides if rain becomes heavy.
clothing_advice: Waterproof jacket, warm layers, water-resistant shoes, and an umbrella are essential.

attraction_ratings_and_reviews.name: Sweet Spot Coffee
attraction_ratings_and_reviews.review: Highly rated for its espresso and cozy atmosphere.

attraction_ratings_and_reviews.name: Man Versus Machine Coffee Roasters
attraction_ratings_and_reviews.review: Known for its specialty coffee and minimalist design.

attraction_ratings_and_reviews.name: English Garden
attraction_ratings_and_reviews.review: A must-visit for nature lovers, even in light rain.

attraction_ratings_and_reviews.name: BMW Welt
attraction_ratings_and_reviews.review: Free entry and fascinating exhibits on German engineering.
